subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The hugs and high-fives have finally come for the Knicks. After last week’s brawl -- and suspensions -- the players have bonded and the depleted team has engineered two straight victories.
snippet: The hugs and high-fives have finally come for the Knicks. After last week’s brawl -- and suspensions -- the players have bonded and the depleted team has engineered two straight victories.
